metadata.title: CVE-2021-25684 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Certified (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
It was discovered that apport in data/apport did not properly open a reportfile to prevent hanging reads on a FIFO.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-25684` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

apport - 2.20.11-0ubuntu27.16
apport-gtk - 2.20.11-0ubuntu27.16
apport-kde - 2.20.11-0ubuntu27.16
apport-noui - 2.20.11-0ubuntu27.16
apport-retrace - 2.20.11-0ubuntu27.16
apport-valgrind - 2.20.11-0ubuntu27.16
dh-apport - 2.20.11-0ubuntu27.16
python3-apport - 2.20.11-0ubuntu27.16
python3-problem-report - 2.20.11-0ubuntu27.16
No subscription required

criterions.comment: apport package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.20.11-0ubuntu27.16').
